description: This file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling for different types of exceptions and returning custom error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A centralized Spring Boot REST controller advice for handling exceptions globally across the application, providing structured error responses.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: A nested static class that defines the structure of the error response payload sent to clients, including status, message, timestamp, and optional details.

methods.name: handleProductNotFoundException
methods.description: Handles ProductNotFoundException by returning a 404 NOT FOUND response with an ErrorResponse body.

methods.name: handleValidationException
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException for validation errors, compiling field errors into a map and returning a 400 BAD REQUEST.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolationException
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException, collects violations into a map, and returns a 400 BAD REQUEST.

methods.name: handleGenericException
methods.description: Catches all other exceptions, returning a 500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR with a message.

methods.name: ErrorResponse (constructor)
methods.description: Constructs an ErrorResponse object with status, message, timestamp, and optionally details.
